page.title: 01Armitage,Handsacre,H.Ridware
page.content: Armitage with Handsacre are two villages linked together to form one. The other smaller villages in area are. Hill Ridware, Pipe Ridware,Nethertown, Mavesyn Ridware, Kings Bromley.The area is mainly farmland. Much housing was originally built by the Coal board.Most men from around Handsacre work at Lea Hall Colliery and Armitage Shanks Pottery.The Pottery is world famous for its bathroom ware. There are many unemployed workers. Near Kings Bromley there is a large Sand and Gravel Quarry which is also an important Nature Reserve.The River Trent flows into quarry which is an important nature reserve.There is a large inland colony of cormorants. The parish contains a population of 4,000 There are 9 parish councillors,1Ind 2Con 6Lab
